00028 fsal_status_t  FSAL_lock(
00029     fsal_handle_t           * objecthandle,           /* IN */
00030     fsal_op_context_t             * p_context,                   /* IN */
00031     fsal_lockparam_t        * lock_info,            /* IN */
00032     fsal_lockdesc_t         * lock_descriptor         /* OUT */
00033 ){
00034 
00035   /* sanity checks. */
00036   if ( !objecthandle || !p_context || !lock_descriptor )
00037     Return(ERR_FSAL_FAULT ,0 , INDEX_FSAL_lock);
00038   
00039   Return(ERR_FSAL_NOTSUPP ,0 , INDEX_FSAL_lock);
00040 }

00047 fsal_status_t  FSAL_changelock(
00048     fsal_lockdesc_t         * lock_descriptor,      /* IN / OUT */
00049     fsal_lockparam_t        * lock_info             /* IN */
00050 ){
00051   
00052   /* sanity checks. */
00053   if ( !lock_descriptor )
00054     Return(ERR_FSAL_FAULT ,0 , INDEX_FSAL_changelock);
00055   
00056   Return(ERR_FSAL_NOTSUPP ,0 , INDEX_FSAL_changelock);

00065 fsal_status_t  FSAL_unlock(
00066     fsal_lockdesc_t * lock_descriptor         /* IN/OUT */
00067 ){
00068   
00069   /* sanity checks. */
00070   if ( !lock_descriptor )
00071     Return(ERR_FSAL_FAULT ,0 , INDEX_FSAL_unlock);
00072   
00073   Return(ERR_FSAL_NOTSUPP ,0 , INDEX_FSAL_unlock);
